text: Samara Ermekovna Karimova (, born 10 April 1991 in Özgörüsh, Batken Region) is a Kyrgyz pop singer, who is considered a pop star in her homeland. She is a soloist of the National Theater in Osh.Гүлнур Жумалиева. Cамара Каримова: Сахнага чыгышыма жолдошум себепчи болду // "Кабар Ордо" 18.04.15 11:26 () She is married and has three children. ==References== == External links == *Samara Karimova at SoundCloud Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Ethnic Kyrgyz people (individuals) Category:Kyrgyzstani female singers Category:People from Batken Region
title: Samara Karimova
